feedback: Correct - Good Form: The shape of the vase clearly demonstrates craftsmanship.
Incorrect - Poor Taste: Taste is in the eye of the designer as well as the viewer.
Incorrect - Contrasting Themes: There is uniformity in the shape, but there is no depth to this media to imply that it is contrasting with other figures.
Correct - AI: While a modification of prior work, this is still AI generative work.
Incorrect - Shading: While there is a light source and a shadow cast, shading is a term used for pencil based sketching.
Incorrect - Original Work: Artwork created from generative AI can not be original since it is trained on other artists' work.
Incorrect - Accessible: The color scheme while high contrast in some areas, loses form in others and has written text unrelated to the character.
